results.content: Great explanations and very easy to follow. I think that a basic understanding of CSS and HTML is necessary to get the most out of the course. But if you have those, this course provides a good bridge to achieve a higher level. I liked in particular the sections about the chrome developer tool and the possibilities to change files. Thanks you very much John for this course.

results.content: Overall a good basic course.  The CSS lost me because I have no knowledge of the language.  Other than  that the course was very helpful.

results.content: I've taken a couple of your courses and you're the best instructor.  Everything is step by step, you speak clearly, and you make it fun.  Thank You

results.content: I really enjoyed the course and expecting more advance courses in future. Only the thin I want to add i.e. if you can just provide the source materials like images and others for our practice and go at same pace with you. Thanks.

results.content: This builds upon the prior course, so I think I'll learn a lot more because I have some foundation to build upon. John is effective in his delivery.

results.content:
This course is excellent for an absolute beginner. The instructor is very detailed, patient and doesn't assume things about what you know, or might not know.

I'm way beyond this level, and so wish I hadn't bought (my fault, not the instructor's). However, if you're new to Wordpress, web development and customizing WP themes, this is a good place to start.

If you're already doing customizations and looking to get even better, then you should skip this course and opt for a more advanced course.

The teacher is excellent however.
results.content_html:

results.content: This course was very helpful and cleared up a few things I've been struggling with. I appreciate that there's a bit of everything for different learning styles: theory, explanation, visual. The process of actually going through a site and working through it from beginning to end is perfect. Raising both hands to continue with progressively advanced courses!! Highly recommend.
